title: Advanced Psychotherapies
description: Theory and application of advanced approaches in psychotherapy, including, but not limited to: cognitive-behavioral therapies, psychodynamic therapies and humanistic/existential therapies. The Schedule of Classes will list therapy selected. Total credit limited to 12 units. 4 seminars.
prerequisites: PSY 555, PSY 560, PSY 565 and admission to MS Psychology program, or consent of instructor
